#NCR – Solid Waste Removal Tender

## Request for Proposal - RFP

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites interested bidders to submit proposals for Solid Waste Removal services at various NRC sites across the National Capital Region.

### Overview

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the provision of solid waste removal, recyclable collection, and organic waste collection services to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in accordance with the detailed Statement of Work provided in the Annex.

### Requirements and Instruction to Bidders

1.0 Mandatory Requirements:

*   Bidder must hold a valid organization security clearance as indicated in Part 6 - Resulting Contract Clauses.
*   Proposed individuals requiring access to classified or protected information, assets, or sensitive work sites must meet the security requirements as indicated in Part 6 - Resulting Contract Clauses.
*   Bidder must provide the name of all individuals who will require access to classified or protected information, assets, or sensitive work sites.

2.0 Bidding Requirements:

*   Interested bidders must submit an electronic Technical Proposal and an electronic Financial Proposal in two separate attachments to meet the requirement forming part of this RFP.
*   Proposals should include a front page of this RFP duly completed.
*   Bidders must be responsible for the timely and correct delivery of bids.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Mandatory Site Visit

It is mandatory that the bidder or a representative of the bidder visit the work sites to familiarize themselves with the requirements.

### Important Information

*   Canada reserves the right to negotiate with bidders on any procurement.
*   Proposals must be valid for not less than sixty (60) calendar days from the closing date of the RFP.

### Closing Date

The closing date for this RFP is September 26, 2023 at 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time.

Eligible bidders are invited to submit their proposals by the closing date and time specified above. All required documents and supporting materials must be uploaded through the Bid Receiving system.

Please refer to the RFP document for additional information and details.
